about.headline: Hardcore Experiences for LATAM
about.body:
Since 2020, MindBreakers has built one of Latin America's strongest gaming communities. We started with DayZ, evolved through V Rising, and continue expanding our universe.

We're not just servers‚Äîwe're experiences designed for players seeking real challenges, active communities, and performance without excuses. LATAM-optimized ping, and a team that understands what true gamers need.

2026 marks our biggest expansion: HumanitZ in February and SCUM in May. We are gamers tired that the best servers are always in NA, having to play with ping to have a quality experience.
about.statsLine: 5+ years of operation ¬∑ Multiple titles ¬∑ Thousands of active players

cta.question: Are you a content creator or want to collaborate?

description.part1: is an open-world zombie survival game where you scavenge, build, and fight to stay alive. Our
description.part2: is designed exclusively for Latin American content creators and their communities‚Äîno pay-to-win, no random griefers, just pure survival with people who take it seriously.

whitelist.title: WHY
whitelist.description1: We're not trying to fill slots‚Äîwe're building a community. Our whitelist process ensures every player on the server is here for the right reasons: great content, epic moments, and genuine survival gameplay.
whitelist.description2: Priority is given to content creators, established communities, and players recommended by existing members. This isn't about exclusivity‚Äîit's about quality.

noGriefers.title: No Random Griefers
noGriefers.description: Every player is vetted. Toxic behavior = permanent ban.

communityFirst.title: Community First
communityFirst.description: Streamers bring their audiences. Play with people who matter.

contentReady.title: Content-Ready
contentReady.description: Epic moments happen when everyone's invested in the experience.

majorFeatures.title: THE BIGGEST
majorFeatures.description: After 2 years of Early Access, 20 major updates and countless minor ones, HumanitZ arrives with its long-awaited version 1.0

newIsland.title: NEW ISLAND
newIsland.subtitle: End-game Content
newIsland.description: Discover and explore a brand-new island with challenging end-game content for veteran survivors.

skillsProfessions.title: SKILLS & PROFESSIONS
skillsProfessions.subtitle: Character Progression
skillsProfessions.description: Brand-new skill trees and profession system. Specialize your survivor and unlock unique abilities.

hudsonCity.title: HUDDSON CITY REWORK
hudsonCity.subtitle: Full Map Overhaul
hudsonCity.description: Complete main map overhaul including a totally redesigned Huddson City. Fresh exploration awaits.

controller.title: CONTROLLER & STEAM DECK
controller.subtitle: Full Support
controller.description: Play your way with full controller support and optimized Steam Deck compatibility.

allFeatures.title: EVERYTHING IN
allFeatures.description: From new weapons to swimming mechanics, here's everything that's coming

systems.name: Systems
items: Ammo stays in weapons when dropped

allFeatures.footerNote: ...and many more bug fixes, polish, and quality of life improvements!

mapOverhaul.title: FULL MAP
mapOverhaul.description: Every corner of the world has been redesigned. See the dramatic transformation from Early Access to version 1.0 across all location types.

residential.before: Basic suburban layouts with minimal detail and sparse environments
residential.after: Redesigned neighborhoods with street lights, environmental clutter, realistic wear and tear, and improved atmosphere

commercial.before: Simple store layouts with basic props and flat surroundings
commercial.after: Detailed strip malls with lush vegetation, improved signage, realistic parking lots, and post-apocalyptic storytelling

gasStations.before: Basic character creation system with limited options and minimal customization
gasStations.after: Improved character creation system with greater emphasis on professions to unlock initial perks. And a new afflictions system for experienced players.

rural.before: Basic perks system with limited options and simple progression
rural.after: Complete rework of the perks system to be more realistic and comprehensive, with improved skill trees and deeper progression

community.title: BUILT FOR THE
community.description1: We're not here to make money. We're here because we love survival games and want to give Latin American players the server they deserve.
community.description2: Mind Breakers Humanitz is a hardcore whitelisted experience designed specifically for content creators and their communities. Immersive gameplay, intense PvP and special events.
community.description3: Hosted in Argentina for the best ping across all of Latin America. No pay-to-win, no VIP tiers, no hidden costs. Just pure survival.

serverConfig.title: SERVER
serverConfig.description: Carefully tuned settings for the ultimate hardcore survival experience

highLoot.title: ENHANCED LOOT
highLoot.description: Cycles developed for high player count but understanding that it's a survival game and not everything is obtainable immediately. Trading will be important.

highZombies.title: HIGH ZOMBIES
highZombies.description: Massive zombie populations create constant danger and tension. Every step could be your last. Stay alert, move smart.

highChallenge.title: HIGH CHALLENGE
highChallenge.description: Balanced difficulty that rewards skill and teamwork. Survival with 'High Risk, High Reward' philosophy.

whitelisted.title: WHITELISTED
whitelisted.description: Application-based access ensures a quality community. No griefers, no trolls‚Äîjust dedicated survivors.

latamOptimized.title: LATAM OPTIMIZED
latamOptimized.description: Argentina-based servers deliver sub-50ms ping for most Latin American players. Smooth, responsive gameplay guaranteed.

creatorFriendly.title: CREATOR FRIENDLY
creatorFriendly.description: Built for streamers and YouTubers. Bring your community, create epic content, build your following.

targetAudience.title: WHO IS THIS
items: Content creators looking for a dedicated LATAM server
Communities who want to play together
Anyone who loves a real challenge

latamSection.title: LATAM
latamSection.description: Best ping for Argentina, Brazil, Uruguay, Chile, Peru, Colombia, Mexico and all Latin America

whitelist.title: Request Access
whitelist.description1: Our HumanitZ server is exclusive and requires whitelist access. This ensures a quality gaming experience with a committed community and no griefers.
whitelist.description2: Complete the form to request access. The process takes only 2 minutes and we'll notify you when your request is approved.
whitelist.description: Complete the form to request access to our HumanitZ server. The form takes only 2 minutes.

noGriefers.title: No Griefers
noGriefers.description: Only verified players can access, eliminating toxic behavior issues.

communityFirst.title: Community First
communityFirst.description: We prioritize players who value teamwork and collaborative experience.

contentReady.title: Content Ready
contentReady.description: Optimized configuration for content creators looking to record or stream.

cta.title: READY TO
cta.description: Join our Discord to apply for whitelist access and be ready for launch day. Version 1.0 drops February 6, 2026.

hero.title: This Is Not A Game, It's A Gaming Experience
hero.description: Premium game server hosting. Exceptional performance, reliability and experience focused on communities and content creation. Have an idea for a series? We make it happen!

gameServers.title: Our Game Servers
gameServers.description: We aim to always have unique experiences in the projects we select. We make the difference by creating our own configurations and mods developed by us to offer players gameplay different from what they're used to.

humanitz.title: HumanitZ Server
humanitz.description: 100% FREE survival zombie server with base building, PvP, and an active community. Launching February 6, 2026!

scum.title: SCUM Server
scum.description: Survive in our custom-configured SCUM server with balanced gameplay, regular events, and an active community. Launching in Q2 2026!

hytale.title: Hytale MMORPG Server
hytale.description: We're developing a Sandbox MMORPG that feels alive based on organic PvP with defined classes and where the philosophy is high risk, high reward.

dayz.title: DayZ Server
dayz.description: Our first server that started the MindBreakers community. A top-ranked LATAM DayZ server from 2020-2021. A super hardcore experience with 124 players.

vrising.title: V Rising Server
vrising.description: A successful vampire survival server that ran in 2023. The top first server worldwide. Build your castle, hunt for blood, and dominate the night.

previousServers.title: Previous Servers
previousServers.description: The servers that made us great and created the MindBreakers community (They'll be back...)

features.title: Why Choose MindBreakers
features.description: We offer more than just game servers. Join a community of gamers with custom configurations and exceptional support.

highPerformance.title: High Performance
highPerformance.description: Our servers are powered by top-tier hardware to ensure smooth gameplay with minimal lag and downtime.

antiCheat.title: Anti-Cheat Protection
antiCheat.description: Advanced anti-cheat systems to keep gameplay fair and enjoyable for everyone in the community.

activeSupport.title: Active Support
activeSupport.description: Our dedicated team is available to help with any issues and ensure your gaming experience is seamless.

customConfigurations.title: Custom Configurations
customConfigurations.description: Enhance your gameplay with our carefully crafted game settings and custom features.

statsDashboard.title: Stats Dashboard
statsDashboard.description: Access detailed statistics about your gameplay, server performance, and community engagement.

communityEvents.title: Community Events
communityEvents.description: Participate in regular community events, competitions, and special gameplay scenarios.

cta.title: Join the MindBreakers Team
cta.description: Ready to elevate your gaming experience? Create an account to access our dashboard, manage your subscriptions, and join our thriving community.

fallback.description: Our SCUM server is launching in Q2 2026. We're preparing a balanced survival experience with active PvP, whitelist protection, and a dedicated community.
fallback.cta: Join the MindBreakers SCUM community and be ready for launch day!

gameFeatures.title: WHY
gameFeatures.description: Discover what makes SCUM one of the most immersive survival experiences available

survival.title: SURVIVAL OF THE FITTEST
survival.description: Master the complex metabolism system, manage your character's needs, and survive in a brutal open-world environment.

combat.title: INTENSE PVP COMBAT
combat.description: Engage in tactical combat with realistic ballistics, weapon customization, and strategic base building.

crafting.title: ADVANCED CRAFTING
crafting.description: Craft weapons, tools, and structures using a detailed crafting system with hundreds of recipes.

baseBuilding.title: BASE BUILDING
baseBuilding.description: Build and fortify your base with advanced construction mechanics. Protect your loot and survive raids.

openWorld.title: MASSIVE OPEN WORLD
openWorld.description: Explore a 144 km¬≤ island with diverse biomes, military installations, and hidden locations to discover.

community.title: ACTIVE COMMUNITY
community.description: Join a thriving community of survivors. Form alliances, trade resources, and compete in events.

cta.title: READY TO
cta.description: Join our Discord to get whitelisted and start your survival journey on the MindBreakers SCUM server

login.title: Welcome Back
login.subtitle: Sign in to access your game servers

register.title: Create an Account
register.subtitle: Join the MindBreakers community
register.success: Account created! Please check your email to verify your account.

footer.description: Premium game server hosting with exceptional performance and community focus.

noStreams.title: No active streams
noStreams.description: Add Kick streamers to start watching multiple streams simultaneously

noActive.title: No active chat
noActive.description: Click on any stream's chat icon to activate its chat here

add.title: Add streams
add.description: Use the "Add" button and enter the Kick username of the streamer you want to watch.

layout.title: Change layout
layout.description: Choose between 1x1, 2x2, 3x3 or 4x4 depending on how many streams you want to watch at once.

share.title: Share
share.description: Share your configuration with friends using the share button. The URL saves your entire setup.
